scripts.elm-nuke: rm -rf elm-stuff && elm package install -y && cd tests && rm -rf elm-stuff && elm package install -y && cd ..
scripts.gen:starwars: npm run build && cd examples && ../bin/graphqelm https://graphqelm.herokuapp.com/api --base Swapi && elm-format src/Swapi --yes && cd -
scripts.gen:github: npm run build && cd examples && ../bin/graphqelm https://api.github.com/graphql --header 'authorization: Bearer dbd4c239b0bbaa40ab0ea291fa811775da8f5b59' --base Github && elm-format src/Github --yes && cd -
